ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Goto the Sea Furies. That spot can support 3 full groups of lvl 50 s. They spawn so insanely fast. ... ______________________________________________________
ygData.messageBody:
Goto the Sea Furies. That spot can support 3 full groups of lvl 50's. They
spawn so insanely fast.


>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant
>Date: Wed, 26 Jan 2000 00:39:08 -0500
>
>Heh only 200 50. The diffrence is these 50's are not the average player we
>are all huge addicts and play a good 10 hours a day usually. So maybe you
>should rethink that. Ok how many 49's? About 200 again. How many 48's about
>300. How many 47's ? About 300 and so and so on. How many 46+ zones ? The
>planes and I guess lower guk and sol b but they have level 30's in them and
>it's crowded in with the high levels. You also have kedge keep but the
>spawns in there is like 4-6 hours on most mobs so 2 good groups can go in
>and clear the spawns and leave. So you got sol b, lower guk, and the 3
>planes. Now even when we did all the planes that's about 30-40 in each
>plane. That's not even 10% of the 46+ people online. The dragons are a long
>spawn so they get done quickly and fire giants are a 8 hour spawn to. So
>you
>got all these 46+ people who play a good 10 hours at the least usually 5
>hours a day. So why do you think were ocmplaining now?
>
>Naeeldar
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: kim@... <kim@...>
>To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Date: Tuesday, January 25, 2000 8:10 PM
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant
>
>
> >From: <kim@...>
> >
> >On Tue, 25 Jan 2000, Naeeldar wrote:
> >>
> >> On E'ci of just plain level 50's there is over 100+. May even be up to
>200
> >> now. That's just the level 50's.
> >
> >Ok, 200 L50 players. Average load on the server over 24 hours
> >is, say, 1500 (low - in your favor). Say the average player
> >plays 4 hours per day (high - in your favor). That's 9000
> >players, only 200 of whom are L50.
> >
> >--
> >John H. Kim
